mapper.select: SELECT P.PROFILE_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, PROFILE_CAREER, PROFILE_FEE, PROFILE_TARGET, PROFILE_AREA, PF_FILE_ROUTE, PF_FILE_NAME, PF_FILE_UUID FROM TBL_PROFILE P JOIN TBL_USER U ON P.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_NUMBER, PF_FILE_ROUTE, PF_FILE_NAME, PF_FILE_UUID FROM ( SELECT PROFILE_NUMBER, PF_FILE_ROUTE, PF_FILE_NAME, PF_FILE_UUID, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY PROFILE_NUMBER ORDER BY PF_FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_PF_FILE ) WHERE RK = 1 ) J1 ON P.PROFILE_NUMBER = J1.PROFILE_NUMBER WHERE PROFILE_FEE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY P.PROFILE_NUMBER
